css: .post-list a{text-decoration:none;color:#222}.p1 .post-item img,.p3 .post-item img,.p6 .post-item img,.p7 .post-item img{width:100%;height:auto;margin-bottom:10px}.p1 .post-item h4,.p3 .post-item h4,.p6 .post-item h4,.p7 .post-item h4{font-size:1rem}.p1 .post-item,.p3 .post-item,.p6 .post-item,.p7 .post-item{padding:10px 10px 30px;border:1px solid #e8e8e8;border-radius:5px;max-width:410px;margin:10px auto 10px;box-shadow:rgba(0,0,0,.19) 0 10px 20px,rgba(0,0,0,.23) 0 6px 6px}.p1 h2::after,.p3 h2::after,.p6 h2::after,.p7 h2::after{content:"";display:block;width:65px;height:6px;border-bottom:4px solid #222;margin:0}.mb-40{margin-bottom:40px}.p2 .post-item img,.p8 .post-item img{width:120px;height:70px;margin-right:10px}.p2 .post-item h4,.p8 .post-item h4{font-size:1rem}.p2 .post-item,.p8 .post-item{padding:5px 5px 30px;border:1px solid #e8e8e8;border-radius:5px;margin:10px auto 10px;display:flex}.p4 .post-item img,.p5 .post-item img{width:100%}.p4 .post-list a,.p5 .post-list a{text-decoration:none;color:#222}.p5 h2::after{content:"";display:block;width:65px;border-bottom:4px solid #222;margin:0}.p4 h4,.p5 h4{margin-bottom:30px;margin-top:5px;font-size:1em}.p4 .post-item p,.p5 .post-item p{color:#817a7a}
